title: Welcome to react using react-i18next---
mainTitle: Enabling Fast Payment Integrations across the globe
mainsubTitle: Swift Enables Fast and Reliable Global Payment services via our super simple APIs.

apiService.caption: Powerful and Easy to use APIs
apiService.description: Our High Performant and blazing fast APIs arre ever ready for you. we have a very clean and concise documentation that will giude you through setting up and familiarizing yourself with what is required

services.subTitle: Swift Networks offers state-of-the-art broadband services for cost-effective and reliable deployment of a multi-service network, offering converged voice telephony, video conferencing, video surveillance, high-Speed data transmission and Internet access services over our secure, high-speed and reliable telecommunications pipe.

cards.firstCardDescription: SWIFT Payment Controls makes it easy for you to mitigate fraudulent attacks by detecting and preventing high-risk payments.
cards.secondCardDescription: Using our Super Fast Recharge APIs, you can buy Large Bundles, Transfer to Third Party and  other operations at lightning speed.
cards.thirdCardDescription: With Seamless integration into Quick Teller, now all your worries about online payments have been taken care of. we'll do the work for you.
